summary:
PepeBee - The Buzzworthy Memecoin - $Bee is tired of some of the Shitcoins on the market. It's time for the hive to shine. The bee is abuzz, and we're the honey-makers you need 
PepeBee, your lucky pollen pal. No boring contracts here, just the buzz of 0xBee, perfect for our yellow and black vibes. $BEE is ready to make memes great again. No presale, no taxes, just inspired by the legendary $PEPE. Let's make some honey, shall we?
